answer:
At ImmunizeBC, our influenza clinic locator is completed by health units, pharmacies, doctors' offices etc., that choose to use our site. We do not have information on all influenza clinics or flu shot availability in BC. If the information is not posted on our locator here, please contact your local health service providers directly to ask about access to the flu shot.
Immunization Nurse
question: When is the mobile flu shot going to be at Interlakes BC
